languages.text: The wielder of this staff (power level 10) gains the Inferno {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. For every two creatures suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1 and the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is increased by +2. +15 Willpower
languages.original_text: Обладатель посоха (уровень 10) получает {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} Инферно. Также варианты этой способности доступны в качестве {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}героического акта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}отчаянных мер{/g}. Значение {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. За каждых двух существ в бою, на которых наложено {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, уровень посоха увеличивается на 1, а {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} — на 2. +15 к Воле

traits.locale_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 10) gains the Inferno ability. The ability is also available in its heroic act and desperate measure versions. Power level affects the damage of this power. For every two creatures suffering burning in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1 and the Willpower bonus is increased by +2. +15 Willpower

The wielder of this staff (power level 10) gains the Inferno {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. For every two creatures suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1 and the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is increased by +2. +15 Willpower

languages.text: 这根法杖（力量等级10）的使用者获得地狱烈焰{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。在战斗中，每当有两个生物陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，这根法杖的力量等级就会提高1级，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}提高2点。 +15意志
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 10) gains the Inferno {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. For every two creatures suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1 and the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is increased by +2. +15 Willpower

traits.locale_text: 这根法杖（力量等级10）的使用者获得地狱烈焰{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。这个能力既可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄壮举{/g}使用，也可以作为{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}背水一战{/g}使用。力量等级会影响此能力造成的伤害。在战斗中，每当有两个生物陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，这根法杖的力量等级就会提高1级，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}提高2点。 +15意志

languages.text: この杖の使用者（パワーレベル10）は灼炎{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても使用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}に影響を及ぼす。戦闘中に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}ダメージを受けた生物2体ごとに、この杖のパワーレベルが1増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が2増加する。 意志力が+15増加
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 10) gains the Inferno {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. For every two creatures suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1 and the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is increased by +2. +15 Willpower

traits.locale_text: この杖の使用者（パワーレベル10）は灼炎{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を獲得する。このアビリティは{g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}英雄的行為{/g}中および{g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}非常手段{/g}においても使用可能である。パワーレベルはこのパワーのダメージに影響を及ぼす。戦闘中に{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}ダメージを受けた生物2体ごとに、この杖のパワーレベルが1増加し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}が2増加する。 意志力が15増加

languages.text: El portador de este báculo (nivel de poder 10) gana la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} Infierno. Esta capacidad también está disponible como {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}acto heroico{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}medida desesperada{/g}. El nivel de poder afecta al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de este poder. Por cada dos criaturas que sufran {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} en el combate, el nivel de poder de este báculo aumenta en +1 y la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} en +2. +15 de Voluntad

Значение урона от этой силы зависит от уровня посоха. За каждых двух существ в бою, на которых наложено {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, уровень посоха увеличивается на 1, а {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} — на 2. +15 к Воле

languages.text: Der Träger dieses Stabes (Energiestufe 10) erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Inferno. Die Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} dieser Kraft. Für je zwei Kreaturen, die im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} erleiden, wird die Energiestufe dieses Stabes um +1 erhöht, und der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} wird um +2 erhöht. +15 Willenskraft
languages.original_text: The wielder of this staff (power level 10) gains the Inferno {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}. The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. For every two creatures suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1 and the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is increased by +2. +15 Willpower

traits.locale_text: Der Träger dieses Stabes (Energiestufe 10) erhält die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} Inferno. Die Fähigkeit ist auch in den Versionen {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Heldentat{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Verzweiflungstat{/g} verfügbar. Die Energiestufe beeinflusst den Schaden dieser Kraft. Für je zwei Kreaturen, die im Kampf {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g} erleiden, wird die Energiestufe dieses Stabes um +1 erhöht, und der {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} wird um +2 erhöht. +15 Willenskraft

languages.text: L'utilisateur de ce bâton (niveau de puissance 10) bénéficie de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Brasier. Des versions {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}Acte héroïque{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}Mesure désespérée{/g} de cette capacité sont également disponibles. Le niveau de puissance détermine les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés. Toutes les deux créatures subissant l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} au combat, le niveau de puissance de ce bâton augmente de +1 et le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} est accru de +2. +15 de Force mentale

The ability is also available in its {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}heroic act{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}desperate measure{/g} versions. Power level affects the {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} of this power. For every two creatures suffering {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} in combat, the power level of this staff is increased by +1 and the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} is increased by +2. +15 Willpower

languages.text: Bu asayı (güç seviyesi 10) kullanan kişi, İnferno {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetini{/g} kazanır. Bu kabiliyetin ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:HeroicAct}kahramanca eylem{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DesperateMeasure}son çare önlem{/g} hâlleri de mevcuttur. Güç seviyesi, bu gücün vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} da etki eder. Çatışmada {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanmaya{/g} maruz kalan her iki yaratık için, bu asanın güç seviyesi 1 puan, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} ise 2 puan artar. +15 İrade
